message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and importance to us, I propose a price of $15000 for it. This reflects not only its worth but also the opportunity cost for us in terms of time and resources invested. I understand its value to you is $12000, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Let me know if this proposal works for you or if you have any suggestions.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between these values?
